title.rendered: Eagle Air (Uganda) Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
We are Uganda’s leading and longest serving air operator for domestic and regional flights. We specialize in provision of schedule and exclusive charter services in Uganda, East Africa and Central Africa. Eagle Air success story started in 1994 with one leased aircraft and subsequently a twin engine serving western region on a regular basis. Today the airline has grown to 5 twin engine and a single engine controlling a wide market in the region.

 

 Eagle Air (Uganda) Address : Headquarters, Kampala

Adam House, Plot 11 Portal Avenue,
P.O. Box 7392, Kampala,UGANDA.

Phone : +256 (0)41 4344292/ 4232185, +256 (0)77 2777337/8, +256 (0)75 2793860

Operations Offices

Address :Airport Terminal Building, 2nd Floor

Phone : + 256 (0)414 320601

Cell: +256 (0)772 777335

Fax : +256 (0) 414 320601

Email : charters@eagleair-ug.co

Regional Offices – Arua Office

Phone : Cell: +256 (0)772 777331 /+256 (0)772 400341

Reservation

Phone :  +256 41 4344292, +256 77 2777337

Email : reservations@eagleair-ug.co

Eagle Air (Uganda) Official website : https://www.eagleair-ug.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Eagle Air (Uganda)

  • Beechcraft 1900D

  • Beechcraft 1900C

  • LET 410 UVP E9

Queries handled by Eagle Air (Uganda) Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Eagle Air (Uganda) Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Eagle Air (Uganda) : (click on the stars below)
